column4: usually you try first install stuff from distro repos, after that you try to find pre packakges to your system (which are all ,deb) if those fails you go to source , compile and install it. so you have .deb packages or zip/tar/gz etc files which you use
/path/program or ./program if program eis same dir or just program if its in path
same way you do it in windows: java some.jar
